## Notetaking purposes

- Project management
  - Keep track of project states, tasks, meetings
- Personal management
  - Plan your days and weeks, to-do lists, track your time
- Literature management
  - Connect Obsidian to Zotero
- Idea/Knowledge management
  - Interconnected notes (Zettelkasten)
- . . .
  
. . . 

In Obsidian you can connect all these purposes
